moreBlocks.articles:
• Bankruptcy
    The attorneys at the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl have more than 25 years of experience representing individual and business debtors in connection with bankruptcy.
  • Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 7 bankruptcy, often called a liquidation or straight bankruptcy, is the most common type of bankruptcy proceeding.
  • Chapter 11
    Contact our Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Maryland Attorney.
  • Chapter 13 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 13 Bankruptcy is a way for people to "reorganize" their debt into a manageable, monthly payment plan that is fair for the individual's creditors.
  • Tax Controversy
    We provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

description:
Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, in Essex, Maryland, represents clients for a wide range of bankruptcy and tax litigation concerns. Our law firm serves clients in the city of Baltimore, and in Harford County, Carroll County, Baltimore County and Howard County.

In our practice, we represent clients for personal bankruptcy, through Chapter 7 liquidation or Chapter 13 debt reorganization or business bankruptcy through Chapter 11. Our practice also entails aggressive legal representation for tax litigation before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and state tax agencies. This includes matters pertaining to audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations and tax court litigation.

With more than 20 years of legal experience and more than 30 years of experience as a certified public accountant (CPA), attorney Robert Stahl has the skill and knowledge to lead our legal team in the successful resolution of our clients' debt and tax issues. Our law firm has been helping individual and business debtors with bankruptcy and tax concerns since 1983. Our goal is to help clients achieve the best possible outcome and a future free of overwhelming financial and tax debt.

To schedule a free initial consultation, call the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, today. We accept credit cards and offer evening and weekend appointments upon request.
